text.tspan: Scheduler triggers job OR User clicks "Scan Now"
Perform targeted LlamaIndex query & Gemma 3 analysis

svg.text: Access UI, Configure Scan (Target, Framework, Schedule)
Query Data Map based on Compliance Rules
Send Prompt (Context + Compliance Rule for Risk Assessment)
Send Scan Results (Map Data, Risks, Explanations, Remediation)
Notify Scan Complete (e.g., WebSocket or status poll)
